text: Shmuel "Samy" Flatto-Sharon (18 January 1930 – 7 December 2018) was an Israeli businessman, radio talk-show host and politician. He was born in Łódź, Poland, and fled to France after the beginning of the war. In 1972-he moved to Israel. He was a member of the Knesset between 1977 and 1981. Flatto-Sharon was a member of the Development and Peace Party. Flatto-Sharon died in Ramat Gan, Israel from a heart attack, aged 88.Shmuel Flatto-Sharon, MK who entered politics to escape prosecution, dies at 88 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Members of the Knesset Category:French businesspeople Category:French Jews Category:Israeli businesspeople Category:Jewish businesspeople Category:Jewish Israeli politicians Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Politicians from Łódź Category:Polish Jews Category:French radio personalities
